titles.title: Federal Election Integrity Act of 2019
To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit certain State election administration officials from actively participating in electoral campaigns.
Federal Election Integrity Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary:
Federal Election Integrity Act of 2019
This bill makes it unlawful for a chief state election administration official to take active part in political management or in a political campaign with respect to any election for federal office over which the official has supervisory authority.
